inclusion.criterion: Currently treated for rigid underarm brace
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Primary Cobb angle between 25 to 40 degrees
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of other musculoskeletal or developmental illness that might be responsible for the spinal curvature
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of previous surgical or orthotic treatment for AIS
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 14-year-old boy with scoliosis and back pain, candidate for scoliosis surgery according to perioperative MEP monitoring
